languages.text: Большинство этих чудес заключалось в том, что машины сами собой оживали, чтобы спасти людей из опасной ситуации, поврежденные шаттлы безопасно добирались до земли, даже лишившись двигателей, а когитаторы вдруг обращались к операторам со словами поддержки и ободрения, изрядно их пугая.

Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.
languages.original_text: Большинство этих чудес заключалось в том, что машины сами собой оживали, чтобы спасти людей из опасной ситуации, поврежденные шаттлы безопасно добирались до земли, даже лишившись двигателей, а когитаторы вдруг обращались к операторам со словами поддержки и ободрения, изрядно их пугая.

traits.locale_text: Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, which scared the life out of them.

Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, which scared the life out of them.

Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.

Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.

Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.

Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.

languages.text: 绝大多数奇迹的表现都是机器突然觉醒，将人们从危险中拯救出来，例如损坏的穿梭机即使没有引擎也能安全着陆，或者是沉思者突然说话，给操作员打气，把他们吓得都说不出话来。
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.

traits.locale_text: 绝大多数奇迹的表现都是机器突然觉醒，将人们从危险中拯救出来，例如损坏的穿梭机即使没有引擎也能安全着陆，或者是思考器突然说话，给操作员打气，把他们吓得都说不出话来。

languages.text: Der Großteil der Wunder bestand darin, dass Maschinen zum Leben erwachten, um jemanden vor einer Gefahr zu retten; dass beschädigte Shuttles selbst ohne Antrieb sicher landeten; oder dass Cogitatoren ihre Operatoren plötzlich mit Worten der Aufmunterung und Unterstützung ansprachen und ihnen so einen ungeheuren Schrecken einjagten.
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.

traits.locale_text: Der Großteil der Wunder bestand darin, dass Maschinen zum Leben erwachten, um jemanden vor einer Gefahr zu retten; dass beschädigte Shuttles selbst ohne Antrieb sicher landeten; oder dass Cogitatoren ihre Operatoren plötzlich mit Worten der Aufmunterung und Unterstützung ansprachen und ihnen so einen ungeheuren Schrecken einjagten.

languages.text: La plupart de ces miracles consistaient en des machines prenant vie afin de sauver une personne d'un danger imminent, des navettes endommagées parvenant à se poser sans moteur fonctionnel, ou des cogitateurs adressant des paroles d'encouragement chaleureuses à leurs opérateurs muets d'effroi.
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.

traits.locale_text: La plupart de ces miracles consistaient en des machines prenant vie afin de sauver une personne d'un danger imminent, des navettes endommagées parvenant à se poser sans moteur fonctionnel, ou des cogitateurs adressant des paroles d'encouragement chaleureuses à leurs opérateurs muets d'effroi.

languages.text: La mayor parte de los milagros consistieron en máquinas que se encendían para salvar a alguien del peligro, lanzaderas dañadas que conseguían aterrizar sin motores y cogitadores que se dirigían de repente a sus operadores con palabras de ánimo y apoyo, lo que los dejaba mudos de terror.
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.

traits.locale_text: La mayor parte de los milagros consistieron en máquinas que se encendían para salvar a alguien del peligro, lanzaderas dañadas que conseguían aterrizar sin motores y cogitadores que se dirigían de repente a sus operadores con palabras de ánimo y apoyo, lo que los dejaba mudos de terror.

languages.text: 奇跡の多くは、機械が息を吹き返し、誰かを危険から救ったり、損傷したシャトルがエンジンがなくても無事に地上に到達したり、考算機が突然オペレーターに励ましや応援の言葉をかけ、オペレーターが言葉を失ってしまうようというようなものだった。
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.

traits.locale_text: 奇跡の多くは、機械が息を吹き返し、誰かを危険から救ったり、損傷したシャトルがエンジンがなくても無事に地上に到達したり、考算機が突然オペレーターに励ましや応援の言葉をかけ、オペレーターが言葉を失ってしまうようというようなものだった。

languages.text: Meydana gelen çoğu mucize; makinelerin harekete geçip birilerini tehlikeden kurtarması, hasarlı ve hatta motorunu kaybeden mekiklerin güvenle yüzeye ulaşması veya kavramsayarların operatörlerine, korkudan küçük dillerini yutmalarına sebep olacak şekilde aniden cesaret verici ve destekleyici sözcükler sarf etmesi şeklinde gerçekleşti.
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to machines coming to life to save someone from danger, damaged shuttles safely reaching the ground even without engines, or cogitators suddenly addressing their operators with words of encouragement and support, scaring them speechless.

traits.locale_text: Meydana gelen çoğu mucize, makinelerin harekete geçip birilerini tehlikeden kurtarması, hasarlı ve hatta motorunu kaybeden mekiklerin güvenle yüzeye ulaşması veya kavramsayarların operatörlerine, korkudan küçük dillerini yutmalarına sebep olacak şekilde aniden cesaret verici ve destekleyici sözcükler sarf etmesi şeklindeydi.
